sqlQuery.name: ProviderAndOrganism
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ens.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, ed.name as provider, ens.sequence, tn.name as genus_species, SUBSTR(tn.name, 1, 1) || '. ' || SUBSTR(tn.name, INSTR(tn.name, ' ', 1, 1) +1) as organism FROM sres.ExternalDatabase ed, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, dots.ExternalNASequence ens, sres.TaxonName tn WHERE ens.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND tn.taxon_id = ens.taxon_id AND tn.name_class = 'scientific name'
